{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = IPQ6010 chipset based module |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.8devices.com/products/mango |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = 8devices_Mango |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = 8devices |model = Mango |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -C/I |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/17/2023 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/8devices_Mango |wlclass = AX1800 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = SoM, module |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Z9WMAN |icid = 11468A-MAN |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ6010; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz 1.8 GHz (+ 1x NPU @1.5GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q256JWEQ; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = 1866MHZ |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Winbond;W634GU6MB-11I; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = PCIe 3.0, USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 3.3 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/04/2023 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5121; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |axqam1 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad1ax = 574 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5152; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam2 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad2ax = 1201 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: IPQ6010 4x @1.8GHz, 802.11ax 2x2 (MU-MIMO) :SoC: 4x ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.2GHz/1.8GHz WiSoC :Flash: 32MB (NOR), RAM: 512MB (DDR3 @1866MHZ) :1x PCie 3.0, 1x USB3.0, 1x USB2.0, 1x SDIO 3.0/eMMC, :1x JTAG, 2x UART, 64x GPIO, 3x SPI, 2x I2C, 4x PWM, :Eth: 2x PSGMII, QSGMII, SGMII+ (SerDes), 1x I2S/TDM
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.8devices.com/wiki/mango On '''8devices''' wiki] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/8devices/8devices_mango On '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
==See also== :;[[8devices]] • [[List of SBCs]] *[[8devices Carambola]] *[[8devices Carambola 2]] *[[8devices Habanero]] *[[8devices Jalapeno]] *[[8devices Lima]] *[[8devices Mango]] *[[8devices Rambutan]]
===Models=== :;[https://www.8devices.com/wiki/ Products] :<u>''Single band''</u> *[[8devices Carambola 2]] • [[Atheros]] AR9331, 16MB/64MB, 1T1R *[[8devices Centipede]] • [[Atheros]] AR9331, 16MB/64MB, 1T1R *[[8devices Kinkan]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8197FS, 32MB/128MB, 2T2R *[[8devices Lima]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA4531, 32MB/64MB, 2T2R :<u>''Dual-band''</u> *[[8devices Habanero]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019, 32MB/512MB, 2T2R, Wave2 *[[8devices Jalapeno]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4018, 128MB/256MB, 2T2R, Wave2 *[[8devices Komikan]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8197FS/RTL8822BEH, 32MB/128MB, 2T2R, BT 4.1 *[[8devices Mango]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ6010/QCN5121/QCN5152, 32MB/512MB, 2T2R, Wi-Fi 6 *[[8devices Rambutan]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9557/QCA9550, 128MB/128MB, 2T2R :<u>''Radio modules''</u> *[[8devices BLACK bean]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9377, 1T1R, BT, USB *[[8devices BLUE bean]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9377, 1T1R, BT, USB *[[8devices RED bean]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9377, 1T1R, SDIO 3.0, UART
